医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
医院水槽助长抗生素耐药细菌传播今天发表在《美国感染控制杂志》上的一项新研究报告了为控制 2017 年东京东邦大学大森医疗中心儿科病房发生的长达数月的产碳青霉烯酶肠杆菌属多物种爆发而采取的感染预防措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Hospital-sinks-fuel-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Hospital-sinks-fuel-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=324b06a6-f43b-4d36-80b9-3d88e20330c8 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 22:07:55 -0400 Hospital sinks fuel antibiotic-resistant bacteria spread
舌下神经刺激为患有 OSA 的儿童唐氏综合症患者带来希望虽然阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停 (OSA) 影响约 5% 的普通儿科人群，但 80% 的唐氏综合症儿童患有 OSA。持续的阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停会导致健康状况不佳，包括认知发展和功能受到干扰，这促使麻省总医院布里格姆分校的医生研究人员研究更好的方法来尽早治疗这些患者，以最大限度地提高他们的健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Hypoglossal-nerve-stimulation-offers-hope-for-pediatric-Down-syndrome-病人-with-OSA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Hypoglossal-nerve-stimulation-offers-hope-for-pediatric-Down-syndrome-病人-with-OSA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12a22829-1b7d-4af2-a131-25315feb82ee Fri, 12 Apr 2024 21:55:00 -0400 Hypoglossal nerve stimulation offers hope for pediatric Down syndrome patients with OSA
人工智能程序可以帮助识别与分娩相关的创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）迹象研究人员采用了人工智能（AI）程序，通过评估分娩患者的简短叙述陈述来识别与分娩相关的创伤后应激障碍（CB-PTSD）的迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/AI-program-can-help-identify-signs-of-childbirth-lated-PTSD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/AI-program-can-help-identify-signs-of-childbirth-lated-PTSD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1029d231-42bf-4828-91d0-05d47fee7a66 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 15:51:48 -0400 AI program can help identify signs of childbirth-related PTSD
氡暴露与非吸烟肺癌的增加有关尽管肺癌传统上被认为是“吸烟者疾病”，但令人惊讶的是，新诊断出的肺癌中有 15-20% 发生在从未吸烟的人群中，其中许多人年龄在 40 多岁或 50 多岁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Radon-exposure-linked-with-concerning-rise-in-non-smoking-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Radon-exposure-linked-with-concerning-rise-in-non-smoking-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=408983d2-18c2-4e87-b276-bc426d7a08ce Fri, 12 Apr 2024 15:46:03 -0400 Radon exposure associated with concerning rise in non-smoking lung cancer
荟萃分析揭示拟南芥中的应激反应基因植物可能是喜怒无常的。即使是高速公路旁的杂草或混凝土人行道裂缝中的杂草也会因脱水、寒冷、过量的盐等而受到压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Meta-analysis-uncovers-stress-responsive-genes-in-Arabidopsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Meta-analysis-uncovers-stress-responsive-genes-in-Arabidopsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30511dcc-9228-4a13-8267-e665bcfc3ddc Fri, 12 Apr 2024 15:39:00 -0400 Meta-analysis uncovers stress-responsive genes in Arabidopsis
揭示 RNA 修饰在 HIV-1 存活和复制中的关键作用一项新的研究发现，HIV-1 RNA 基因组的化学修饰其功能一直是科学争论的问题，现在被证实是病毒感染宿主细胞后生存和繁衍能力的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Unveiling-the-key-role-of-RNA-modification-in-HIV-1-survival-and-replication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Unveiling-the-key-role-of-RNA-modification-in-HIV-1-survival-and-replication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e2dcc6e-a694-457e-a9fe-2d0c5a2cdb7d Fri, 12 Apr 2024 15:31:50 -0400 Unveiling the key role of RNA modification in HIV-1 survival and replication
研究揭示DNA旋转酶如何解决DNA缠结在您的脑海中想象一部传统的“固定电话”电话，其带有将听筒连接到电话的盘绕线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Study-reveals-how-DNA-gyrase-resolves-DNA-entanglements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Study-reveals-how-DNA-gyrase-resolves-DNA-entanglements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb24f6a7-add2-4d5d-b8e2-5137f4c96b48 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 14:03:23 -0400 Study reveals how DNA gyrase resolves DNA entanglements
新的基因变异可能会增加女性因 HPV 感染而患宫颈癌的风险人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 是第二常见的致癌病毒，每年导致全球 690,000 例宫颈癌和其他癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/New-genic-variants-could-raise-a-womans-risk-of-cervical-cancer-from-HPV-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/New-genic-variants-could-raise-a-womans-risk-of-cervical-cancer-from-HPV-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ee0a34c-6c83-4ded-b205-ead06012cad7 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 13:23:12 -0400 New genetic variants could raise a woman's risk of cervical cancer from HPV infections
纳米孔测序揭示了新的端粒长度模式我们依赖于我们的细胞能够分裂和繁殖，无论是为了更换晒伤的皮肤还是补充我们的血液供应并从伤害中恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Nanopore-sequencing-unveils-novel-telomere-length-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Nanopore-sequencing-unveils-novel-telomere-length-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e052b3b8-558f-4d09-b30b-4c54f7215812 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 13:12:59 -0400 Nanopore sequencing unveils novel telomere length patterns
阻断多磷酸盐可能有助于治疗慢性感染大多数致病细菌都以其速度而闻名：短短几分钟内，它们的数量就可以增加一倍，很快就会让人生病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Blocking-polylicates-could-help-treat-chronic-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Blocking-polylicates-could-help-treat-chronic-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c9f05df-4874-41c4-a697-919ee6a0c23d Fri, 12 Apr 2024 11:09:06 -0400 Blocking polyphosphates could help treat chronic infections
